title: Banned for suspected 3rd party software??
body:
about a week ago my account was banned and they said that ive been using 3rd party software, etc scripts hacks.

I have no processes running in the background that could lead to this happening.....

This is what they said:

Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension. etc etc etc


about 5 days later they get some specialist to look into my case and he adds:

Hey there,

The evidence we found on your account confirmed for us that the client played on was modified in a way to give an unfair advantage over others. We take the use of modifications very seriously and consider it an egregious act against the League of Legends community. The negative affect the account had on the community is irreversible and it had an extremely negative impact on the other players in the game. Since this is the case we will not be adjusting the permanent ban.

I know you have some unanswered questions about your suspension which I know is frustrating. However, I won't be able to give any specifics as this will compromise our investigation process. Often times players will write in to figure out how they got caught so they can prevent getting caught again in the future. I am not saying that this is your intent, because I do not believe that it is, but this is why we do not go into specifics about our investigations.

I dont understand, ive never cheated nor used scripts or anything and they randomly perma ban my account?? FOR NO REASON.

Has this happened to anyone else and have you gotten your account back????? please help!!!

replies.body: It may have been a mistake, but it certainly wasn't random or for no reason. They do their best to verify every instance of abuse before punishing and will reverse the punishment if it was found to be in error. It is possible that you have some program that is altering your game files without your knowing, or if anyone else had access to your account or client they may have used them.
